info.author: Amir Bakhtiar
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
info.description:
Pyndex is a simple and fast full-text indexer implemented in Python. It uses
Metakit as its storage back-end. It works well for quickly adding search to an
application, and is also well suited to in-memory indexing and search.
info.name: Pyndex
info.summary: A simple full-text indexer and Bayesian classifier.
info.html_description: Pyndex is a simple and fast full-text indexer implemented in Python. It uses Metakit as its storage back-end. It works well for quickly adding search to an application, and is also well suited to in-memory indexing and search.
